cards.name: Solemn Vigil
cards.flavor: Each year, folk gather in front of Blackrock Mountain to mourn those who were mind-controlled into the lava.
cards.howToEarn: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
cards.text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.

cards.name: Flamewaker
cards.flavor: Flamewakers HATE being confused for Flamewalkers. They just wake up fire, they donâ€™t walk on it. Walking on fire is CRAZY.

cards.name: Dragon's Breath
cards.flavor: Dragons breathe fire, sure, but did you know they can also breathe Cotton Candy?  It's harder to give them a reason to do that, though.

cards.flavor: The twilight whelps are basically magic-vampires. Despite this, they are not a reference to any popular series of novels.

cards.flavor: Demons are not angry most of the time. You have to play this card in order to really bring it out of them.

cards.name: Resurrect
cards.flavor: I walked into the dungeon and noticed a slain adventurer. In his final moments, he had scrawled out a message in the dust on the wall beside him. Two words: 'rez plz'
